text: Recombinant <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-18 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-15 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> MCP-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , <extra_id_0> macrophage inflammatory protein (MIP)-1alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> MIP-1beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were purchased from R & D systems ( Minneapolis , MN , USA ) .

<extra_id_0> Phytohemagglutinin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate ( PDTC ) , rapamycin , dexamethasone and curcumin were all obtained from the Sigma Chemical Co . ( St Louis , MA , USA ) .
